div.div: Relative changes of SD of monthly temperature anomalies until the end of the 21st century.
div.p: ( A) Boreal summer [June, July, and August (JJA)], ( B) austral summer [December, January, and February (DJF)], and ( C) the whole year, averaged over 37 climate models.
